context: In January 2020, Globant acquired BiLive (Argentina), continuing its acquisition strategy. The company operated as a digitally native provider offering services in engineering, innovation, design, and artificial intelligence across various sectors including automotive, media & entertainment, healthcare, finance, airlines, hospitality, gaming, edtech, sports, and retail. Services included software development, AI integration, enterprise software customization, and cloud computing.
